name: Undead Feud
description:
You noticed your friend waving at you with concern, so you stopped the farm work you were doing to go over to him. See what he needs from you to end a conflict between him and his undead friend!

Assets used:

  1. Pixel Art Platformer - Village Props by Cainos: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-villa...
  2. 2D platform Characters by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-characters
  3. LeanTween by Dented Pixel: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/leantween-3595
  4. Platform Jump SFX by Jofae: https://freesound.org/people/Jofae/sounds/362328/
  5. Chiptune Music - "Traveling in the Sea" by Migfus20: https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/sounds/683268/
